column4: Hi everyone, I've just installed ubuntu 10.10 on a vaio desktop and I don't know how to get the internet up and running, I asked in #ubuntu-us-mi and a person there thinks I have a problem because of a "Intel Pro/100VE ethernet card that isn't working correctly", can you help?
this is the channel you should be asking technical support questions in, the other channel system are a fan community
not everybody is going to like me saying this but #linux is also helpful
